system.description:
Effect: The Weather is set to Thunderstorm for the next 5 Rounds.
The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.
Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Pikachu and has an Electric-Type attack on their Active List.
